data.text:
@shawnrouse Why did Russian vehicles run out of gas, have the tires fall off, and why are they obsolete and the soldiers untrained? 

Google the naval tactic of using "block ships". It will change how you see the war.

@shawnrouse I invest in stocks. My existence depends on living on social media, seeing what narratives people believe, and investing accordingly. 

I could tell you in detail how I see it, but tweets won't begin to cover it. The world doesn't run on facts. It runs on feelings.

@Mark_Wilson_ I don't quite know how to respond to that. I can tell you believe it, but it's foreign to everything in my experience. Since it is, it seems like paranoia/conspiracy thinking through my perception. I'm not sure what would justify that kind of deception from your life experience.

@shawnrouse I don't feel the need to prove the entire thing is a sham, but if anyone can prove the government cares about the health and well-being of NB families, that would be swell.

Perspective matters. That's why we must "swallow the science" and never question authority #Disinformation
@shawnrouse Thinking about this, again. Would be curious to know if anyone has tracked (or will be tracking) other first responders such as firefighters.
@Looking4truth5 @shawnrouse Our medical professionals are in an abusive relationship with our government. And everyone knows you can't repair an abusive relationship. You can only leave.

@shawnrouse How many have the vaccines injured. This is a real current event.

https://t.co/EnpaibVv3G
@shawnrouse But in a week they're all free to go back to work, right?
